Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
34 Āsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Āsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
43.
125Āsavavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
126Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
127Āsavavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
<< 33 Sāsavaduka, Kusalattikaup35 Āsavasāsavadukādi, Kusalattika >>
